## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2fee464177826907b82fc78a239b4b2460b4c6c18abeb5c15be7490fdf8aa5f0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'azure-boards-estimate' @ 2.2.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
